message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. I believe it holds significant value, and I'm confident it can greatly benefit you. I'm initially proposing a price of $1,400,000. I'm open to discussing this further, so please let me know your thoughts.
I appreciate your initial offer, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $900,000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the market value of similar products.

Bob, I understand your perspective on the market value.  However, this product offers unique advantages and its value goes beyond those comparisons. I'm willing to come down to $1,300,000. I believe this is a fair reflection of its worth and potential.

I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still not convinced that the price is right. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I can only go up to $1,150,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value you're offering.
